reasoning: MDD global incidence ~350 per 100k person-years, prevalence ~4.3% (4300 per 100k). DSM-defined condition with robust epidemiological data from WHO GBD and multiple cohort studies.
source: Kessler RC et al. (2005). Prevalence and treatment of mental disorders, 1990 to 2003. N Engl J Med. 352:2515-2523
